data.actual_result: You can't open the Channel Drawer with the touchscreen, only with the back button when you have the "Back button opens channel drawer" setting on.
data.short_description: Channel Drawer not opening (only with the Back hardware button if you have the option enabled)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open "Members" sidebar - Click on yourself - Open up "Text & Images" - Untick and tick something - Press back until you leave the settings
